SEARCH
Package com.sc2002.view

Class HDBManagerView

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.view.HDBManagerView
public class HDBManagerView extends Object
Handles the user interface and interactions for users with the HDB Manager role. Provides menu options for managing BTO projects (create, edit, delete, toggle visibility), managing officer registrations, handling BTO applications (approve, reject, withdrawal), managing enquiries, and generating reports.

  • Constructor Details

    • HDBManagerView

      public HDBManagerView()
      Default constructor for HDBManagerView. Initializes view components. Controllers are initialized within the HDBManagerMenu method using the AppContext.

  • Method Details

    • HDBManagerMenu

      public void HDBManagerMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Displays the main menu for the HDB Manager user and handles user input for navigation.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context containing shared resources and state.

    • printProjectsManagedByUser

      private void printProjectsManagedByUser(List<BTOProjectModel> managerProjects)
      Prints a list of projects currently managed by the logged-in manager.
      Parameters:
      managerProjects - A list of BTOProjectModel objects managed by the user.

    • createProjectMenu

      private void createProjectMenu(AppContext appContext)
      Handles the menu flow for creating a new BTO project. Checks if the manager is already managing a project before proceeding.
      Parameters:
      appContext - The application context.
